intro: Don the cloak of a Grim Reaper and free tormented souls in a non-violent, spooky adventure with 11 haunting tales.
description: Embrace the eerie charm of a Grim Reaper in this haunting narrative flight simulation. The game plunges you into dark, mysterious landscapes shrouded in shadows and secrets. Your task is to glide through these foreboding realms, shooting cages to free tormented souls. Each freed soul recounts a chilling story, piece by piece, revealing 11 short, spine-tingling tales that delve into the macabre and the supernatural. The non-violent gameplay is designed to be immersive yet unsettling, creating an atmosphere of suspense and intrigue. Collect energy to fuel your shots, explore the haunting beauty of the game’s environments, and experience a spooky adventure where every soul's story adds a new layer to the dark narrative.
